lead_paragraph: The police fired tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse hundreds of demonstrators in Indian-controlled Kashmir on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Violent Protest in Kashmir

snippet: The police fired tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse hundreds of demonstrators in Indian-controlled Kashmir on Friday.
abstract: At least 20 Indian police personnel and five protesters are injured in Kashmir when demonstration against killing of a militant commander’s brother turns violent.
